 WinMenuItem ()

Detailed Description

Obsolete - a WinMenuItem is needed by a MenuList, which is obsolete. Use Menu and MenuAccessor from Gui instead.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.
